entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 7:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
